CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `bed_type` (`id` tinyint(3) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,`name` char(50) DEFAULT NULL,`price` decimal(35,0) DEFAULT NULL,PRIMARY KEY (`id`)) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `beds` (`id` smallint(5) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,`ward_id` smallint(5) DEFAULT NULL,`bed` smallint(5) NOT NULL,`types` tinyint(3) DEFAULT 0,`user_id` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,`add_date` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT current_timestamp(),PRIMARY KEY (`id`),UNIQUE KEY `bed` (`ward_id`,`bed`) USING BTREE) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `bypass` (`id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,`user_id` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,`visit_id` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,`parent_id` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,`diet_id` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,`method` tinyint(4) DEFAULT NULL,`description` varchar(700) DEFAULT NULL,`update_date` datetime DEFAULT NULL,`add_date` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT current_timestamp(),PRIMARY KEY (`id`)) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `bypass_date` (`id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,`bypass_id` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,`parent_id` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,`time` time DEFAULT NULL,`date` date NOT NULL,`comment` varchar(500) DEFAULT NULL,`status` tinyint(1) DEFAULT NULL,`completed` tinyint(1) DEFAULT NULL,`add_date` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT current_timestamp(),PRIMARY KEY (`id`)) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `bypass_preparat` (`id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,`bypass_id` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,`preparat_id` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,`preparat_name` varchar(700) DEFAULT NULL,`preparat_supplier` varchar(700) DEFAULT NULL,`preparat_die_date` date DEFAULT NULL,`qty` smallint(6) NOT NULL,`add_date` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT current_timestamp() ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(),PRIMARY KEY (`id`)) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `bypass_time` (`id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,`bypass_id` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,`time` time DEFAULT NULL,`add_date` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT current_timestamp(),PRIMARY KEY (`id`)) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `collection` (`id` smallint(5) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,`level` tinyint(1) NOT NULL,`parent_id` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,`amount_bank` decimal(65,1) DEFAULT 0.0,`add_date` datetime DEFAULT current_timestamp(),PRIMARY KEY (`id`)) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `company` (`const_label` char(50) NOT NULL,`const_value` varchar(500) DEFAULT NULL,PRIMARY KEY (`const_label`)) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `diet` (`id` tinyint(3) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,`name` varchar(500) DEFAULT NULL,`price` decimal(65,1) DEFAULT 0.0,`add_date` datetime DEFAULT current_timestamp(),`update_date` datetime DEFAULT current_timestamp(),PRIMARY KEY (`id`)) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `division` (`id` smallint(5) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,`level` tinyint(4) DEFAULT NULL,`title` char(100) DEFAULT NULL,`name` char(50) DEFAULT NULL,`assist` tinyint(1) DEFAULT NULL,PRIMARY KEY (`id`)) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `guides` (`id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,`name` varchar(350) NOT NULL,`price` decimal(65,1) DEFAULT 0.0,`share` float DEFAULT 0,`add_date` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT current_timestamp(),PRIMARY KEY (`id`)) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `investment` (`id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,`pricer_id` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,`user_id` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,`balance_cash` decimal(65,1) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0.0,`balance_card` decimal(65,1) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0.0,`balance_transfer` decimal(65,1) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0.0,`status` tinyint(1) DEFAULT 1,`add_date` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT current_timestamp(),PRIMARY KEY (`id`)) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `multi_accounts` (`id` smallint(5) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,`slot` char(15) NOT NULL,`user_id` int(11) NOT NULL,PRIMARY KEY (`id`)) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `notes` (`id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,`parent_id` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,`visit_id` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,`date_text` char(255) NOT NULL,`description` char(255) NOT NULL,`status` int(11) DEFAULT 0,`time_text` char(100) NOT NULL,PRIMARY KEY (`id`)) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `operation` (`id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,`visit_id` int(11) NOT NULL,`user_id` int(11) NOT NULL,`grant_id` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,`division_id` smallint(5) DEFAULT NULL,`item_id` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,`item_name` varchar(700) DEFAULT NULL,`item_cost` decimal(65,1) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0.0,`oper_date` datetime DEFAULT NULL,`add_date` datetime DEFAULT current_timestamp(),`priced_date` datetime DEFAULT NULL,`completed` datetime DEFAULT NULL,PRIMARY KEY (`id`)) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `operation_consumables` (`id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,`operation_id` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,`item_name` varchar(700) DEFAULT NULL,`item_cost` decimal(65,1) DEFAULT 0.0,`add_date` datetime DEFAULT current_timestamp(),PRIMARY KEY (`id`)) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `operation_inspection` (`id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,`operation_id` int(11) NOT NULL,`parent_id` int(11) NOT NULL,`report` text NOT NULL,`status` tinyint(1) DEFAULT NULL,`add_date` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT current_timestamp(),PRIMARY KEY (`id`)) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `operation_member` (`id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,`operation_id` int(11) NOT NULL,`member_name` varchar(500) DEFAULT NULL,`member_operator` tinyint(1) DEFAULT NULL,`price` decimal(65,1) DEFAULT 0.0,PRIMARY KEY (`id`)) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `operation_preparat` (`id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,`operation_id` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,`item_id` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,`item_name` varchar(700) DEFAULT NULL,`item_cost` decimal(65,1) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0.0,`item_qty` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,`add_date` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT current_timestamp(),PRIMARY KEY (`id`)) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `operation_service` (`id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,`operation_id` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,`parent_id` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,`item_id` smallint(5) DEFAULT NULL,`item_name` varchar(700) DEFAULT NULL,`item_cost` decimal(65,1) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0.0,`add_date` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT current_timestamp(),PRIMARY KEY (`id`)) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `operation_stats` (`id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,`parent_id` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,`operation_id` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,`time` time NOT NULL,`pressure` varchar(20) DEFAULT NULL,`pulse` smallint(11) DEFAULT NULL,`temperature` float DEFAULT NULL,`saturation` tinyint(4) DEFAULT NULL,`add_date` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT current_timestamp(),PRIMARY KEY (`id`)) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `package` (`id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,`autor_id` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,`name` char(100) NOT NULL,`items` longtext NOT NULL,`add_date` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT current_timestamp(),PRIMARY KEY (`id`)) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci;
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `province` (`id` tinyint(2) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,`name` varchar(70) NOT NULL,PRIMARY KEY (`id`)) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `region` (`id` smallint(5) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,`province_id` int(11) NOT NULL,`name` varchar(300) NOT NULL,PRIMARY KEY (`id`)) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `service` (`id` smallint(5) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,`user_level` tinyint(4) DEFAULT NULL,`division_id` smallint(5) DEFAULT NULL,`code` char(30) DEFAULT NULL,`name` varchar(500) DEFAULT NULL,`price` decimal(65,1) DEFAULT NULL,`type` smallint(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT 1,PRIMARY KEY (`id`)) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `service_analyze` (`id` smallint(5) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,`service_id` smallint(5) DEFAULT NULL,`name` char(100) DEFAULT NULL,`code` char(50) DEFAULT NULL,`standart` text NOT NULL,`unit` char(50) DEFAULT NULL,`status` tinyint(1) DEFAULT 1,PRIMARY KEY (`id`)) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `service_preparat` (`id` smallint(5) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,`service_id` smallint(5) DEFAULT NULL,`preparat_id` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,`qty` int(11) NOT NULL,PRIMARY KEY (`id`)) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `sessions` (`session_id` char(255) NOT NULL,`self_id` char(20) DEFAULT NULL,`self_ip` char(15) DEFAULT NULL,`self_login` char(100) DEFAULT NULL,`self_render` char(200) DEFAULT NULL,`self_agent` varchar(300) DEFAULT NULL,`last_update` datetime DEFAULT current_timestamp(),`first_login` datetime DEFAULT current_timestamp(),PRIMARY KEY (`session_id`)) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `sidebar` (`id` tinyint(3) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,`level` smallint(2) DEFAULT NULL,`sort` tinyint(2) DEFAULT NULL,`is_parent` tinyint(1) DEFAULT NULL,`parent_id` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,`module` char(50) DEFAULT NULL,`route` char(50) DEFAULT NULL,`icon` char(50) DEFAULT NULL,`name` char(50) DEFAULT NULL,`is_active` varchar(700) DEFAULT NULL,`is_division` char(3) DEFAULT NULL,`script` text DEFAULT NULL,`script_item` tinytext DEFAULT NULL,`badge_class` char(100) DEFAULT NULL,PRIMARY KEY (`id`)) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `storage` (`id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,`parent_id` int(11) NOT NULL,`code` char(50) DEFAULT NULL,`name` varchar(700) DEFAULT NULL,`supplier` varchar(700) DEFAULT NULL,`category` tinyint(4) DEFAULT NULL,`qty` int(11) NOT NULL,`qty_sold` int(11) NOT NULL,`qty_limit` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,`cost` decimal(65,1) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0.0,`price` decimal(65,1) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0.0,`faktura` char(50) DEFAULT NULL,`shtrih` bigint(13) DEFAULT NULL,`add_date` date NOT NULL,`die_date` date NOT NULL,PRIMARY KEY (`id`)) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `storage_home` (`id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,`preparat_id` int(11) NOT NULL,`status` tinyint(4) DEFAULT NULL,`parent_id` int(11) NOT NULL,`code` char(50) DEFAULT NULL,`name` varchar(700) DEFAULT NULL,`supplier` varchar(700) DEFAULT NULL,`category` tinyint(4) DEFAULT NULL,`qty` int(11) NOT NULL,`qty_sold` int(11) NOT NULL,`cost` decimal(65,1) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0.0,`price` decimal(65,1) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0.0,`faktura` char(50) DEFAULT NULL,`shtrih` varchar(500) DEFAULT NULL,`die_date` date NOT NULL,PRIMARY KEY (`id`)) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `storage_orders` (`id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,`user_id` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,`parent_id` int(11) NOT NULL,`preparat_id` int(11) NOT NULL,`qty` smallint(6) NOT NULL,`date` date NOT NULL,PRIMARY KEY (`id`)) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `storage_sales` (`id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,`code` char(50) DEFAULT NULL,`name` varchar(700) DEFAULT NULL,`supplier` varchar(700) DEFAULT NULL,`qty` int(11) NOT NULL,`price` decimal(65,1) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0.0,`sale` float DEFAULT 0,`amount` decimal(65,1) DEFAULT 0.0,`amount_cash` decimal(65,1) DEFAULT 0.0,`amount_card` decimal(65,1) DEFAULT 0.0,`amount_transfer` decimal(65,1) DEFAULT 0.0,`parent_id` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,`operation_id` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,`add_date` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT current_timestamp(),PRIMARY KEY (`id`)) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `templates` (`id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,`autor_id` int(11) NOT NULL,`name` varchar(500) NOT NULL,`description` text DEFAULT NULL,`add_date` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT current_timestamp(),PRIMARY KEY (`id`)) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `users` (`id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,`parent_id` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,`username` char(20) DEFAULT NULL,`password` char(70) DEFAULT NULL,`first_name` char(30) DEFAULT NULL,`last_name` char(30) DEFAULT NULL,`father_name` char(30) DEFAULT NULL,`dateBith` date DEFAULT NULL,`region` char(255) DEFAULT NULL,`passport_seria` char(50) DEFAULT NULL,`passport_pin_fl` char(50) DEFAULT NULL,`placeWork` varchar(1000) DEFAULT NULL,`position` varchar(1000) DEFAULT NULL,`numberPhone` char(255) DEFAULT NULL,`residenceAddress` varchar(1000) DEFAULT NULL,`registrationAddress` varchar(1000) DEFAULT NULL,`gender` tinyint(1) DEFAULT NULL,`user_level` tinyint(4) NOT NULL,`division_id` smallint(5) DEFAULT NULL,`status` tinyint(1) DEFAULT 1,`share` float DEFAULT 0,`resident` tinyint(1) DEFAULT NULL,`room` smallint(6) DEFAULT NULL,`token_telegramm` char(250) DEFAULT NULL,`pacs_login` char(50) DEFAULT NULL,`pacs_password` char(50) DEFAULT NULL,`add_date` datetime(6) DEFAULT current_timestamp(6),PRIMARY KEY (`id`)) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `visit` (`id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,`user_id` int(11) NOT NULL,`grant_id` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,`parent_id` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,`route_id` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,`assist_id` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,`division_id` smallint(5) DEFAULT NULL,`service_id` smallint(5) DEFAULT NULL,`bed_id` smallint(5) DEFAULT NULL,`direction` tinyint(1) DEFAULT NULL,`status` tinyint(1) DEFAULT 0,`diagnostic` tinyint(1) DEFAULT NULL,`laboratory` tinyint(1) DEFAULT NULL,`physio` tinyint(1) DEFAULT NULL,`manipulation` tinyint(1) DEFAULT NULL,`guide_id` smallint(5) DEFAULT NULL,`complaint` varchar(700) DEFAULT NULL,`failure` char(255) DEFAULT NULL,`report_title` varchar(200) DEFAULT NULL,`report` text DEFAULT NULL,`add_date` datetime DEFAULT current_timestamp(),`accept_date` datetime DEFAULT NULL,`priced_date` datetime DEFAULT NULL,`discharge_date` date DEFAULT NULL,`completed` datetime DEFAULT NULL,PRIMARY KEY (`id`)) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `visit_analyze` (`id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,`user_id` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,`visit_id` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,`service_id` smallint(5) DEFAULT NULL,`analyze_id` smallint(5) DEFAULT NULL,`result` varchar(150) DEFAULT NULL,`deviation` tinyint(1) DEFAULT NULL,`description` varchar(300) DEFAULT NULL,PRIMARY KEY (`id`)) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `visit_inspection` (`id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,`visit_id` int(11) NOT NULL,`parent_id` int(11) NOT NULL,`report` text NOT NULL,`add_date` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT current_timestamp(),PRIMARY KEY (`id`)) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `visit_price` (`id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,`visit_id` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,`user_id` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,`pricer_id` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,`operation_id` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,`price_cash` decimal(65,1) DEFAULT 0.0,`price_card` decimal(65,1) DEFAULT 0.0,`price_transfer` decimal(65,1) DEFAULT 0.0,`sale` float DEFAULT 0,`status` tinyint(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT 1,`item_type` tinyint(4) NOT NULL,`item_id` int(11) NOT NULL,`item_cost` decimal(65,1) DEFAULT NULL,`item_name` varchar(500) NOT NULL,`price_date` datetime DEFAULT NULL,`add_date` datetime DEFAULT current_timestamp(),PRIMARY KEY (`id`)) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `visit_sale` (`id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,`visit_id` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,`parent_id` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,`sale_bed` float DEFAULT 0,`sale_bed_unit` decimal(65,1) DEFAULT 0.0,`sale_service` float DEFAULT 0,`sale_service_unit` decimal(65,1) DEFAULT 0.0,`add_date` datetime DEFAULT current_timestamp(),PRIMARY KEY (`id`)) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `visit_stats` (`id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,`visit_id` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,`parent_id` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,`stat` tinyint(1) DEFAULT NULL,`pressure` char(20) DEFAULT NULL,`pulse` smallint(11) DEFAULT NULL,`temperature` float DEFAULT NULL,`saturation` tinyint(4) DEFAULT NULL,`breath` float DEFAULT NULL,`urine` float DEFAULT NULL,`description` varchar(700) DEFAULT NULL,`add_date` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT current_timestamp(),PRIMARY KEY (`id`)) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `wards` (`id` smallint(5) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,`floor` tinyint(4) DEFAULT NULL,`ward` smallint(6) DEFAULT NULL,`add_date` datetime DEFAULT current_timestamp(),PRIMARY KEY (`id`),UNIQUE KEY `floor` (`floor`,`ward`) USING BTREE) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci;
